scripts.db:console: sudo docker compose run postgres psql -h postgres -U postgres -d webapp_dev
scripts.docker:db:migrate: sudo docker compose run backend pnpm db:migrate
scripts.docker:db:migrate:undo: sudo docker compose run backend pnpx knex migrate:down
scripts.docker:seed:dev: sudo docker compose run backend pnpm ts-node scripts/seed/dev.ts
scripts.rebuild:be: sudo docker compose build backend && sudo docker compose rm --force --stop backend && sudo docker compose up -d backend
scripts.seed:dev: sudo docker compose run backend pnpm ts-node scripts/seed/dev.ts
scripts.watch: watchy --no-init-spawn --debounce 1 -w src -- sudo docker compose restart backend
